page.title: 09SLAINS PARK FARM KINNEFF
page.content: {Slains Park Farm,}owned by Mr.James Forbes, covers about 1000 acres. It is a mixed farm having a{dairy}and growing a variety of{crops.}They have around 200 Friesian milking cows giving about 3500 litres of milk per day.They have about 150 bullocks reared on slats in a special byre. They are fed mainly on barley until they are fat enough to be sold at the mart in Aberdeen.The main crops grown are wheat,barley and seed potatoes. Much of the potato crop is exported. The farm has 6 tractors and the most powerful one is the Ford 8210.They used to have 3 combine harvesters but now have 2 bigger ones. Four men work in the dairy and five men work out on the farm. The farm is busy all the year round.
